ModMetaData.name: Mod Medicine Patch Pharmacist Patch
ModMetaData.author: Antaios
ModMetaData.description:
A patch to enable modded medicine options in Fluffy's Pharmacist mod.
Works with: Pharmacist v0.18.0.5 Mod-Medicine-Patch vA18_1.0.5
*Requires Mod Medicine Patch *Requires Pharmacist *Load AFTER BOTH
Version A18_1.0.0
